name: tapa bear
greetingText: i realised that I never gave you a nickname!! so, you're my Tapa Bear (cute and cuddly like u)
wishText: STAY JUST THE WAY YOU ARE, YOU ARE PRECIOUS <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was gonna do...
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: sorry, i prolly won't be able to be there for you tomorrow
replayText: but, hey I will always be there for you for your entire life
